datagroup.name: 现状专题

theme.name: 总体情况
theme.layer-ref: 一级地类{yearfilter}@DLBM_YJFL;基础底图影像{yearfilter}
theme.layout-ref: Config\DataOverView\chart\chart_layout\专题浏览\土地利用现状\土地利用现状.json

datatable.name: 土地利用构成

theme.datatable: with a as (select 合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地,农用地,建设用地 ,未利用地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') ) SELECT '耕地' as 地类, round(耕地,2) as 面积,round(耕地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类, round(种植园用地,2) as 面积,round(种植园用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类, round(林地,2) as 面积,round(林地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类, round(草地,2) as 面积,round(草地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类, round(水域及水利设施用地,2) as 面积,round(水域及水利设施用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '湿地' as 地类, round(湿地,2) as 面积, round(湿地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类, round(交通运输用地,2) as 面积,round(交通运输用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类, round(商业服务业用地,2) as 面积,round(商业服务业用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, round(工矿用地,2) as 面积,round(工矿用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, round(住宅用地,2) as 面积,round(住宅用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类, round(公共管理与公共服务用地,2) as 面积,round(公共管理与公共服务用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类, round(特殊用地,2) as 面积,round(特殊用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类, round(其他土地,2) as 面积,round(其他土地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '农用地' as 地类, round(农用地,2) as 面积,round(农用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '建设用地' as 地类, round(建设用地,2) as 面积,round(建设用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '未利用地' as 地类, round(未利用地,2) as 面积,round(未利用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a

datatable.name: 土地利用构成二级分类

theme.datatable: SELECT 地类,地类面积 FROM view_sd_ejtdlyfl_{jb} where f_xzqhdm = fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter} and (position(一级地类名 in '{childfilter}')>0 or position(三大类 in '{childfilter}')>0) order by 地类编码

datatable.name: 下一级政区某地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 下级名称,下级代码,合计,湿地 ,红树林地 ,森林沼泽 ,灌丛沼泽 ,沼泽草地 ,盐田 ,沿海滩涂 ,内陆滩涂 ,沼泽地 ,耕地 ,水田 ,水浇地 ,旱地 ,种植园用地 ,果园 ,茶园 ,橡胶园 ,其他园地 ,林地 ,乔木林地 ,竹林地 ,灌木林地 ,其他林地 ,草地 ,天然牧草地 ,人工牧草地 ,其他草地 ,商业服务业用地 ,商业服务业设施用地 ,物流仓储用地 ,工矿用地 ,工业用地 ,采矿用地 ,住宅用地 ,城镇住宅用地 ,农村宅基地 ,公共管理与公共服务用地 ,机关团体新闻出版用地 ,科教文卫用地 ,公用设施用地 ,公园与绿地 ,特殊用地 ,交通运输用地 ,铁路用地 ,轨道交通用地 ,公路用地 ,城镇村道路用地 ,交通服务场站用地 ,农村道路 ,机场用地 ,港口码头用地 ,管道运输用地 ,水域及水利设施用地 ,河流水面 ,湖泊水面 ,水库水面 ,坑塘水面 ,沟渠 ,水工建筑用地 ,冰川及永久积雪 ,其他土地 ,空闲地 ,设施农用地 ,田坎 ,盐碱地 ,沙地 ,裸土地 ,裸岩石砾地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}' ) select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 湿地 as 面积,round( 湿地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '湿地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 红树林地 as 面积,round( 红树林地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '红树林地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 森林沼泽 as 面积,round( 森林沼泽 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '森林沼泽' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 灌丛沼泽 as 面积,round( 灌丛沼泽 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '灌丛沼泽' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 沼泽草地 as 面积,round( 沼泽草地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '沼泽草地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 盐田 as 面积,round( 盐田 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '盐田' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 沿海滩涂 as 面积,round( 沿海滩涂 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '沿海滩涂' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 内陆滩涂 as 面积,round( 内陆滩涂 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '内陆滩涂' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 沼泽地 as 面积,round( 沼泽地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '沼泽地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 耕地 as 面积,round( 耕地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '耕地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 水田 as 面积,round( 水田 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '水田' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 水浇地 as 面积,round( 水浇地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '水浇地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 旱地 as 面积,round( 旱地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '旱地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 种植园用地 as 面积,round( 种植园用地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '种植园用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 果园 as 面积,round( 果园 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '果园' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 茶园 as 面积,round( 茶园 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '茶园' as 地类 from a union 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 草地 as 面积,round( 草地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '草地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码, 天然牧草地 as 面积,round( 天然牧草地 *100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例, '天然牧草地' as 地类 theme.datatable: with a as (select ls0101,ls0102,ls0103,lyfl0101,lyfl0102,lyfl0103,fls0101,fls0102,fls0103,lljz0101,lljz0102,lljz0103,xg0101,xg0102,xg0103,wg0101,wg0102,wg0103 from view_sd_tdlyzzsx_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '种植粮食作物' as 类型,ls0101 as "水田",ls0102 as "水浇地",ls0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '种植非粮食作物' as 类型,fls0101 as "水田",fls0102 as "水浇地",fls0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '粮与非粮轮作' as 类型,lyfl0101 as "水田",lyfl0102 as "水浇地",lyfl0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '林粮间作' as 类型,lljz0101 as "水田",lljz0102 as "水浇地",lljz0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '休耕' as 类型,xg0101 as "水田",xg0102 as "水浇地",xg0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '未耕种' as 类型,wg0101 as "水田",wg0102 as "水浇地",wg0103 as "旱地" from a

datatable.name: 耕地细化

theme.datatable: with a as (select hj,hdgd,hqgd,lqgd,mqgd,shgd,smgd,yjgd,f_year,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(hdgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(hqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(lqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(mqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(shgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(smgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(yjgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a

datatable.name: 耕地细化内各地类

theme.datatable: with a as (select hdgd0101,hdgd0102,hdgd0103,hqgd0101,hqgd0102,hqgd0103,lqgd0101,lqgd0102, lqgd0103,mqgd0101,mqgd0102, mqgd0103,shgd0101,shgd0102, shgd0103,smgd0101,smgd0102, smgd0103,yjgd0101,yjgd0102, yjgd0103 from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd0101 as 水田,hdgd0102 as 水浇地, hdgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd0101 as 水田,hqgd0102 as 水浇地, hqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd0101 as 水田,lqgd0102 as 水浇地, lqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd0101 as 水田,mqgd0102 as 水浇地, mqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd0101 as 水田,shgd0102 as 水浇地, shgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd0101 as 水田,smgd0102 as 水浇地, smgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd0101 as 水田,yjgd0102 as 水浇地, yjgd0103 as 旱地 from a

datatable.name: 各行政区耕地细化调查情况统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,hj,河道耕地,hdgd0101,hdgd0102,hdgd0103,湖区耕地,hqgd0101,hqgd0102,hqgd0103,林区耕地,lqgd0101,lqgd0102,lqgd0103,牧区耕地,mqgd0101,mqgd0102,mqgd0103, 沙荒耕地,shgd0101,shgd0102,shgd0103,石漠化耕地,smgd0101,smgd0102,smgd0103,盐碱耕地,yjgd0101,yjgd0102,yjgd0103 from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 行政区各种植类型面积
种植园用地细化

theme.datatable: select a.hj as {xzqh}种植园用地总面积,case when b.种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round(a.hj/b.种植园用地*100,2) end as 占种植园用地总面积的比例 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_{jb} a ,view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整种植园用地

theme.datatable: select 可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地 as 可调整种植园用地总面积,case when 种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round((可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地)/种植园用地*100,6) end as 占种植园用地总面积的比例 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} a, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整种植园用地面积汇总表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地,可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地 FROM view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 林地细化

theme.datatable: select '垃圾填埋林地分类面积' as 类型, (乔木林地+竹林地+灌木林地+其他林地) as 面积 from view_sd_fqxhbztjb_{jb} where f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter} union all select '林地总面积' as 类型, 林地 as 面积 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter}

datatable.name: 可调整属性_林地

theme.datatable: with a as (select (bm0301k+bm0302k+bm0307k) as hj,bm0301k,bm0302k,bm0307k from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,round(sum(面积)/(case when sum(hj)=0 then 1 else sum(hj) end)*100,2) as 占比 from ( select '可调整乔木林地' as 地类,bm0301k as 面积,hj from a union all select '可调整竹林地' as 地类,bm0302k as 面积,hj from a union all select '可调整其他林地' as 地类,bm0307k as 面积,hj from a ) b group by 地类

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_林地

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm03,bm0301k,bm0302k,bm0307k from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,round(sum(面积)/(case when sum(bm03)=0 then 1 else sum(bm03) end)*100,6) as 占比 from ( select '可调整乔木林地' as 地类,bm0301k as 面积,bm03 from a union all select '可调整竹林地' as 地类,bm0302k as 面积,bm03 from a union all select '可调整其他林地' as 地类,bm0307k as 面积,bm03 from a) c group by 地类

datatable.name: 可调整地类_草地

theme.datatable: select sum(bm0403k) as {xzqh}可调整人工牧草地总面积,round(sum(bm0403k)/sum(bm04)*100,6) as 占草地总面积的比例 from ( select bm0403k,bm04 from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') a

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_草地

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm04,bm0401,bm0402,bm0404,bm0403k,bm0403 from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,case when (sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100) >0.01 then round(sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100,2) else round(sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100,6) end as 占比 from ( select '天然牧草地' as 地类,bm0401 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '人工牧草地' as 地类,bm0403 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '其他草地' as 地类,bm0404 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '可调整人工牧草地' as 地类,bm0403k as 面积,bm04 from a) c group by 地类

datatable.name: 恢复属性_草地

theme.datatable: select 类型,面积,round(a.面积/b.草地*100,6) as 占比 from ( select '即可恢复' as 类型,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404 as 面积 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') union all select '工程恢复' as 类型,gchf0403k+gchf0404 as 面积 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) a ,view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 恢复属性详情_草地

theme.datatable: SELECT '即可恢复' as 类型,0 as 天然牧草地, jkhf0403k as 人工牧草地,jkhf0404 as 其他草地 FROM view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') union all select '工程恢复' as 类型, 0 as 天然牧草地,gchf0403k as 人工牧草地,gchf0404 as 其他草地 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 林区范围内种植园用地汇总统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,下级代码,hj,bm0201,bm0202,bm0203,bm0204 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 种植园用地细化详情

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm0201,bm0202,bm0203,bm0204 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select 地类,面积,case when 种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round(面积/种植园用地*100,2) end as 占比 from ( select '果园' as 地类,bm0201 as 面积 from a union all select '茶园' as 地类,bm0202 as 面积 from a union all select '橡胶园' as 地类,bm0203 as 面积 from a union all select '其他园地' as 地类,bm0204 as 面积 from a) c, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 林地细化标注面积汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,(乔木林地+竹林地+灌木林地+其他林地),乔木林地,竹林地,灌木林地,其他林地 FROM view_sd_fqxhbztjb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 林地细化详情

theme.datatable: with a as (select c.林地,b.乔木林地,b.竹林地,b.灌木林地,b.其他林地 from view_sd_fqxhbztjb_{jb} b left join view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} c on b.f_year=c.f_year and b.f_xzqhdm=c.f_xzqhdm where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '乔木林地' as 地类,乔木林地 as 面积,case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(乔木林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '竹林地' as 地类,竹林地 as 面积,case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(竹林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '灌木林地' as 地类,灌木林地 as 面积,case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(灌木林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '其他林地' as 地类,其他林地 as 面积,case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(其他林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a

datatable.name: 草地面积汇总表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,sum(bm04),sum(bm0401),sum(bm0403),sum(bm0403k),sum(bm0404) FROM view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' group by 下级名称,下级代码 order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 即可恢复与工程恢复种植属性汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404+gchf0403k+gchf0404,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404,jkhf0403k,jkhf0404,gchf0403k+gchf0404,gchf0403k,gchf0404 FROM view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_园地

theme.datatable: with a as (select 可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select 地类,面积,case when 种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round(面积/种植园用地*100,2) end as 占比 from ( select '果园' as 地类,可调整果园 as 面积 from a union all select '茶园' as 地类,可调整茶园 as 面积 from a union all select '橡胶园' as 地类,可调整橡胶园 as 面积 from a union all select '其他园地' as 地类,可调整其他园地 as 面积 from a) c, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整林地面积分类汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,(可调整乔木林地+可调整竹林地+可调整其他林地),可调整乔木林地,可调整竹林地,可调整其他林地 FROM view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

theme.datatable: with a as (select 耕地,水田,水浇地,旱地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '水田' as 地类,水田 as 面积,case when 耕地=0 then 0.00 else round(水田/耕地*100,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '水浇地' as 地类,水浇地 as 面积,case when 耕地=0 then 0.00 else round(水浇地/耕地*100,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '旱地' as 地类,旱地 as 面积,case when 耕地=0 then 0.00 else round(旱地/耕地*100,2) end as 占比 from a

theme.datatable: with a as (select 水域及水利设施用地,河流水面,湖泊水面,水库水面,坑塘水面,沟渠,水工建筑用地,冰川及永久积雪,养殖坑塘,干渠 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b,view_sd_bfxhdlhzb_{jb} c where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and c.f_year ={yearfilter} and c.f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '水域及水利设施用地' as id,'' as parent,'水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,水域及水利设施用地 as 面积 from a union all select '河流水面' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'河流水面' as 地类,河流水面 as 面积 from a union all select '湖泊水面' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'湖泊水面' as 地类,湖泊水面 as 面积 from a union all select '水库水面' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'水库水面' as 地类,水库水面 as 面积 from a union all select '坑塘水面' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'坑塘水面' as 地类,坑塘水面 as 面积 from a union all select '沟渠' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'沟渠' as 地类,沟渠 as 面积 from a union all select '水工建筑用地' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'水工建筑用地' as 地类,水工建筑用地 as 面积 from a union all select '冰川及永久积雪' as id,'水域及水利设施用地' as parent,'冰川及永久积雪' as 地类,冰川及永久积雪 as 面积 from a union all select '养殖坑塘' as id,'坑塘水面' as parent,'养殖坑塘' as 地类,养殖坑塘 as 面积 from a union all select '干渠' as id,'沟渠' as parent,'干渠' as 地类,干渠 as 面积 from a union all select '可调整养殖坑塘' as id,'养殖坑塘' as parent,'可调整养殖坑塘' as 地类,可调整养殖坑塘 as 面积 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

theme.datatable: select c.下级名称,c.下级代码,水域及水利设施用地,河流水面,湖泊水面,水库水面,坑塘水面,养殖坑塘,可调整养殖坑塘,沟渠,干渠,水工建筑用地,冰川及永久积雪 from (select a.下级名称,a.下级代码,水域及水利设施用地,河流水面,湖泊水面,水库水面,坑塘水面,养殖坑塘,沟渠,干渠,水工建筑用地,冰川及永久积雪 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} a left join view_sd_bfxhdlhzb_sub_{jb} b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') c left join view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} d on c.下级代码=d.下级代码 where d.f_year ={yearfilter} and d.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 湿地结构

theme.datatable: with a as (select 湿地,红树林地,森林沼泽,灌丛沼泽,沼泽草地,盐田,沿海滩涂,内陆滩涂,沼泽地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '红树林地' as 地类,红树林地 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(红树林地*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '森林沼泽' as 地类,森林沼泽 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(森林沼泽*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '灌丛沼泽' as 地类,灌丛沼泽 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(灌丛沼泽*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '沼泽草地' as 地类,沼泽草地 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(沼泽草地*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '盐田' as 地类,盐田 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(盐田*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '沿海滩涂' as 地类,沿海滩涂 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(沿海滩涂*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '内陆滩涂' as 地类,内陆滩涂 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(内陆滩涂*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '沼泽地' as 地类,沼泽地 as 面积, case when 湿地=0 then 0.00 else round(沼泽地*100/湿地,2) end as 占比 from a

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm00g,bm00j,bm01g,bm01j,bm02g,bm02j,bm03g,bm03j,bm04g,bm04j,bm05g,bm05j,bm06g,bm06j,bm07g,bm07j,bm08g,bm08j,bm09g,bm09j,bm10g,bm10j,bm11g,bm11j,bm12g,bm12j FROM view_sd_yjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') SELECT '湿地' as 地类,bm00g as 国有土地, bm00j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类,bm01g as 国有土地, bm01j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类,bm02g as 国有土地, bm02j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类,bm03g as 国有土地, bm03j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类,bm04g as 国有土地, bm04j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类,bm05g as 国有土地, bm05j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, bm06g as 国有土地, bm06j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, bm07g as 国有土地, bm07j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,bm08g as 国有土地, bm08j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类,bm09g as 国有土地, bm09j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类,bm10g as 国有土地, bm10j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,bm11g as 国有土地, bm11j as 集体土地 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类,bm12g as 国有土地, bm12j as 集体土地 FROM a

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm201,bm202,bm203,bm204,bm205 from view_sd_frdczcgkjydhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =('{xzqhfilter}')) select '城市' as 类型, bm201 as 面积 from a union all select '建制镇' as 类型, bm202 as 面积 from a union all select '村庄' as 类型, bm203 as 面积 from a union all select '盐田及采矿用地' as 类型, bm204 as 面积 from a union all select '特殊用地' as 类型, bm205 as 面积 from a

datatable.name: 城镇村及工矿用地面积汇总表
下一级政区城镇村及工矿用地面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 下级名称,下级代码,bm201,bm202,bm203,bm204,bm205 from view_sd_czcgkjydhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(下级代码) <> fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(f_xzqhdm)), b as (select 下级代码,合计 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(下级代码) <> fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(f_xzqhdm) ) select 下级名称,a.下级代码,bm201 as 面积,'城市' as 地类,round(bm201*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例 from a left join b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 union all select 下级名称,a.下级代码,bm202 as 面积,'建制镇' as 地类,round(bm202*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例 from a left join b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 union all select 下级名称,a.下级代码,bm203 as 面积,'村庄' as 地类,round(bm203*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例 from a left join b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 union all select 下级名称,a.下级代码,bm204 as 面积,'盐田及采矿用地' as 地类,round(bm204*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例 from a left join b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 union all select 下级名称,a.下级代码,bm205 as 面积,'特殊用地' as 地类,round(bm205*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例 from a left join b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码

datatable.name: 城镇村及工矿用地按权属性质汇总

theme.datatable: with a as (select case when czcsxm in ('201','201A') then '城市' when czcsxm in ('202','202A') then '建制镇' when czcsxm in ('203','203A') then '村庄' when czcsxm = '204' then '盐田及采矿用地' when czcsxm = '205' then '特殊用地' end as 类型,case when czcsxm in ('201','201A') then '201' when czcsxm in ('202','202A') then '202' when czcsxm in ('203','203A') then '203' when czcsxm = '204' then '204' when czcsxm = '205' then '205' end as czcsxm, case when qslx = 'GY' then '国有土地' else '集体土地' end as 权属,bm00,bm01,bm02,bm03,bm04,bm05,bm06,bm07,bm08,bm09,bm10,bm11,bm12 from view_sd_tdlyczcsx_qsxz_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 类型,czcsxm,权属,地类,sum(面积) as 面积 from ( select 类型,czcsxm, 权属, '00' as DLBM,'湿地' as 地类,bm00 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'01' as DLBM,'耕地' as 地类,bm01 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, czcsxm,权属,'02' as DLBM,'种植园用地' as 地类,bm02 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, czcsxm,权属,'03' as DLBM,'林地' as 地类,bm03 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, czcsxm,权属,'04' as DLBM,'草地' as 地类,bm04 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'05' as DLBM,'商业服务业用地' as 地类,bm05 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, czcsxm,权属,'06' as DLBM,'工矿用地' as 地类,bm06 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'07' as DLBM,'住宅用地' as 地类,bm07 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'08' as DLBM,'公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,bm08 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'09' as DLBM,'特殊用地' as 地类,bm09 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'10' as DLBM,'交通运输用地' as 地类,bm10 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,czcsxm, 权属,'11' as DLBM,'水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,bm11 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, czcsxm,权属,'12' as DLBM,'其他土地' as 地类,bm12 as 面积 from a) b group by 类型,权属,地类,czcsxm,DLBM ORDER BY czcsxm,DLBM

theme.datatable: with a as (select 高教用地,广场用地,养殖坑塘,干渠,城市独立工业用地,建制镇独立工业用地,村庄独立工业用地, f_xzqhdm,f_year from view_sd_bfxhdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '高教用地' as 细化地类,高教用地 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '广场用地' as 细化地类,广场用地 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '养殖坑塘' as 细化地类,养殖坑塘 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '干渠' as 细化地类,干渠 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '城市独立工业用地' as 细化地类,城市独立工业用地 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '建制镇独立工业用地' as 细化地类,建制镇独立工业用地 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union ALL select '村庄独立工业用地' as 细化地类,村庄独立工业用地 as 面积, f_xzqhdm,f_year from a

datatable.name: 下一级政区某细化地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select a.下级名称,a.下级代码,合计,高教用地,广场用地,养殖坑塘,干渠,城市独立工业用地,建制镇独立工业用地,村庄独立工业用地 from view_sd_bfxhdlhzb_sub_{jb} a left join view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} b on a.下级代码=b.下级代码 where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(a.下级代码) <> fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(a.f_xzqhdm) and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(b.下级代码) <> fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(b.f_xzqhdm) ) select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,高教用地 as 面积,round(高教用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'高教用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,广场用地 as 面积,round(广场用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'广场用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,养殖坑塘 as 面积,round(养殖坑塘*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'养殖坑塘' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,干渠 as 面积,round(干渠*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'干渠' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,城市独立工业用地 as 面积,round(城市独立工业用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'城市独立工业用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,建制镇独立工业用地 as 面积,round(建制镇独立工业用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'建制镇独立工业用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,村庄独立工业用地 as 面积,round(村庄独立工业用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积的比例,'村庄独立工业用地' as 地类 from a

theme.name: 耕地坡度
theme.layer-ref: 三调地类图斑{yearfilter}_耕地坡度级别@GDPDJB_GDPDJB1;基础底图影像{yearfilter}
theme.layout-ref: Config\DataOverView\chart\chart_layout\专题浏览\土地利用现状\耕地坡度.json

datatable.name: 耕地坡度分级面积占比

theme.datatable: with a as (select gdmj,pdmj,hj2,hj6,hj15,hj25,f_xzqhdm,f_year from view_sd_gdpdfjhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') ) select '≤2°' as 坡度级,pdmj as 面积,round(pdmj/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,hj2 as 面积,round(hj2/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,hj6 as 面积,round(hj6/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,hj15 as 面积,round(hj15/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,hj25 as 面积,round(hj25/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a

datatable.name: 耕地结构

theme.datatable: with a as (select 合计,水田,水浇地,旱地 from view_sd_gdejflpdfj_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =('{xzqhfilter}') and case when '{childfilter}' = '≤2°' then gdpdjb = '1' when '{childfilter}' = '2°~6°' then gdpdjb = '2' when '{childfilter}' = '6°~15°' then gdpdjb = '3' when '{childfilter}' = '15°~25°' then gdpdjb = '4' when '{childfilter}' = '>25°' then gdpdjb = '5' end) select '水田' as 地类,水田 as 面积,round(水田/合计*100,2) as 占比 from a union all select '水浇地' as 地类,水浇地 as 面积,round(水浇地/合计*100,2) as 占比 from a union all select '旱地' as 地类,旱地 as 面积,round(旱地/合计*100,2) as 占比 from a

datatable.name: 耕地面积按坡度分级汇总

theme.datatable: select case when gdpdjb = '1' then '≤2°' when gdpdjb = '2' then '2°~6°' when gdpdjb = '3' then '6°~15°' when gdpdjb = '4' then '15°~25°' when gdpdjb = '5' then '>25°' end as 坡度级, 水田,水浇地,旱地 from view_sd_gdejflpdfj_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}'

datatable.name: 耕地坡度分级面积汇总

theme.datatable: with a as (select pdmj,p2,t2,p6,t6,p15,t15,p25,t25 from view_sd_gdpdfjhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '≤2°' as 坡度级,pdmj as 平地,0 as 坡地,0 as 梯田 from a union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,0 as 平地,p2 as 坡地,t2 as 梯田 from a union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,0 as 平地,p6 as 坡地,t6 as 梯田 from a union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,0 as 平地,p15 as 坡地,t15 as 梯田 from a union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,0 as 平地,p25 as 坡地,t25 as 梯田 from a

datatable.name: 耕地坡度分级面积汇总表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,gdmj,pdmj,hj2,t2,p2,hj6,t6,p6,hj15,t15,p15,hj25,t25,p25 from view_sd_gdpdfjhzb_sub_{jb} where f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year={yearfilter} order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 下一级政区耕地坡度面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 下级名称,下级代码,case when gdmj = 0 then 1 else gdmj end as gdmj ,pdmj,hj2,hj6,hj15,hj25 from view_sd_gdpdfjhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(下级代码) <> fn_delxzqhdm_endzero(f_xzqhdm)) select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,pdmj as 面积,round(pdmj*100/gdmj,2) as 占比, '≤2°' as 坡度级 FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,hj2 as 面积,round(hj2*100/gdmj,2) as 占比,'2°~6°' as 坡度级 FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,hj6 as 面积,round(hj6*100/gdmj,2) as 占比,'6°~15°' as 坡度级 FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,hj15 as 面积,round(hj15*100/gdmj,2) as 占比,'15°~25°' as 坡度级 FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,hj25 as 面积,round(hj25*100/gdmj,2) as 占比,'>25°' as 坡度级 FROM a

datatable.name: 耕地质量等别按坡度级

theme.datatable: select '≤2°' as 坡度级,100 as 优,200 as 高,150 as 中,80 as 低 union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,120 as 优,180 as 高,100 as 中,50 as 低 union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,80 as 优,170 as 高,150 as 中,70 as 低 union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,170 as 优,200 as 高,130 as 中,90 as 低 union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,50 as 优,70 as 高,60 as 中,90 as 低

datatable.unit: 公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷

theme.datatable: select pdj as 坡度级,ls as 种植粮食作物,lyfl as 粮与非粮轮作,fls as 种植非粮食作物,lljz as 林粮间作,xg as 休耕,wg as 未耕种 from view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_zzsx_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}'

datatable.name: 耕地细化按坡度级
datatable.unit: 公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷

theme.datatable: select pdj as 坡度级,hdgd as 河道耕地,hqgd as 湖区耕地,lqgd as 林区耕地,mqgd as 牧区耕地,shgd as 沙荒耕地,smgd as 石漠化耕地,yjgd as 盐碱耕地 from view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_xhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}'

datatable.name: 各坡度级耕地按质量等别

theme.datatable: select '≤2°' as 坡度级,100 as 面积,'优' as 质量等级 union all select '≤2°' as 坡度级,200 as 面积,'高' as 质量等级 union all select '≤2°' as 坡度级,150 as 面积,'中' as 质量等级 union all select '≤2°' as 坡度级,80 as 面积,'低' as 质量等级 union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,120 as 面积,'优' as 质量等级 union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,180 as 面积,'高' as 质量等级 union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,100 as 面积,'中' as 质量等级 union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,50 as 面积,'低' as 质量等级 union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,120 as 面积,'优' as 质量等级 union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,180 as 面积,'高' as 质量等级 union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,100 as 面积,'中' as 质量等级 union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,50 as 面积,'低' as 质量等级 union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,120 as 面积,'优' as 质量等级 union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,180 as 面积,'高' as 质量等级 union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,100 as 面积,'中' as 质量等级 union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,50 as 面积,'低' as 质量等级 union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,120 as 面积,'优' as 质量等级 union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,180 as 面积,'高' as 质量等级 union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,100 as 面积,'中' as 质量等级 union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,50 as 面积,'低' as 质量等级

datatable.name: 各坡度级耕地按种植类型

theme.datatable: with a as (select pdj,ls,lyfl,fls,lljz,xg,wg from view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_zzsx_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select pdj as 坡度级,ls as 面积,'种植粮食作物' as 类型 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,lyfl as 面积,'粮与非粮轮作' as 类型 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,fls as 面积,'种植非粮食作物' as 类型 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,lljz as 面积,'林粮间作' as 类型 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,xg as 面积,'休耕' as 类型 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,wg as 面积,'未耕种' as 类型 from a

datatable.name: 各坡度级耕地按细化类型

theme.datatable: with a as (select pdj,hdgd,hqgd,lqgd,mqgd,shgd,smgd,yjgd from view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_xhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select pdj as 坡度级,'河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd as 面积 from a union all select pdj as 坡度级,'盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd as 面积 from a

datatable.name: 25度以上坡耕地细化情况统计表

theme.datatable: select a.下级名称,a.bm01,a.bm0101,a.bm0102,a.bm0103,a.hdgd,a.hdgd0101,a.hdgd0102,a.hdgd0103,a.hqgd,a.hqgd0101,a.hqgd0102,a.hqgd0103,a.lqgd,a.lqgd0101,a.lqgd0102,a.lqgd0103,a.mqgd,a.mqgd0101,a.mqgd0102,a.mqgd0103,a.shgd,a.shgd0101,a.shgd0102,a.shgd0103, a.smgd,a.smgd0101,a.smgd0102,a.smgd0103,a.yjgd,a.yjgd0101,a.yjgd0102,a.yjgd0103,b.bm01,b.bm0101,b.bm0102,b.bm0103,b.hdgd,b.hdgd0101,b.hdgd0102,b.hdgd0103,b.hqgd,b.hqgd0101,b.hqgd0102,b.hqgd0103,b.lqgd,b.lqgd0101,b.lqgd0102,b.lqgd0103,b.mqgd,b.mqgd0101, b.mqgd0102,b.mqgd0103,b.shgd,b.shgd0101,b.shgd0102,b.shgd0103,b.smgd,b.smgd0101,b.smgd0102,b.smgd0103,b.yjgd,b.yjgd0101,b.yjgd0102,b.yjgd0103 from view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_xhdl_sub_{jb} a left join view_sd_tdlygdpdjb_xhdl_sub_{jb} b on a.下级名称=b.下级名称 where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' and a.pdj ='>25°' and a.gdlx='PD' and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' and b.pdj ='>25°' and b.gdlx='TT' order by a.下级代码

theme.name: 可调整地类
theme.layer-ref: 三调地类图斑{yearfilter}_可调整地类@DLBM_EJFL;国土遥感监测影像{yearfilter}

datatable.name: 可调整地类总量

theme.datatable: select 合计 as 可调整地类总面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地,可调整乔木林地,可调整竹林地,可调整其他林地,可调整人工牧草地,可调整养殖坑塘 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '可调整果园' as 地类,可调整果园 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整茶园' as 地类,可调整茶园 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整橡胶园' as 地类,可调整橡胶园 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整其他园地' as 地类,可调整其他园地 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整乔木林地' as 地类,可调整乔木林地 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整竹林地' as 地类,可调整竹林地 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整其他林地' as 地类,可调整其他林地 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整人工牧草地' as 地类,可调整人工牧草地 as 地类面积 from a union all select '可调整养殖坑塘' as 地类,可调整养殖坑塘 as 地类面积 from a

datatable.name: 可调整地类权属构成

theme.datatable: with a as ( select bm0201kg,bm0201kg,bm0202kg,bm0202kj,bm0203kg,bm0203kj,bm0204kg,bm0204kj,bm0301kg,bm0301kj,bm0302kg,bm0302kj,bm0307kg,bm0307kj,bm0403kg,bm0403kj,bm1104kg,bm1104kj,f_year,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_jbntwktzqsxz_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '果园' as 地类,bm0201kg as 国有,bm0201kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '茶园' as 地类,bm0202kg as 国有,bm0202kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '橡胶园' as 地类,bm0203kg as 国有,bm0203kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '其他园地' as 地类,bm0204kg as 国有,bm0204kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '乔木林地' as 地类,bm0301kg as 国有,bm0301kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '竹林地' as 地类,bm0302kg as 国有,bm0302kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '其他林地' as 地类,bm0307kg as 国有,bm0307kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '人工牧草地' as 地类,bm0403kg as 国有,bm0403kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '养殖坑塘' as 地类,bm1104kg as 国有,bm1104kj as 集体,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a

datatable.name: 行政可调整地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 合计,下级名称,下级代码,可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地,可调整乔木林地,可调整竹林地,可调整其他林地,可调整人工牧草地,可调整养殖坑塘,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}' ) select 行政区,下级代码,地类,面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year from ( select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整果园' as 地类,可调整果园 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整茶园' as 地类,可调整茶园 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整橡胶园' as 地类,可调整橡胶园 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整其他园地' as 地类,可调整其他园地 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整乔木林地' as 地类,可调整乔木林地 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整竹林地' as 地类,可调整竹林地 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整其他林地' as 地类,可调整其他林地 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整人工牧草地' as 地类,可调整人工牧草地 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'可调整养殖坑塘' as 地类,可调整养殖坑塘 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM a ) b order by rn

theme.datatable: with a as (select hj,bm00g,bm00j,bm01g,bm01j,bm02g,bm02j,bm03g,bm03j,bm04g,bm04j,bm05g,bm05j,bm06g,bm06j,bm07g,bm07j,bm08g,bm08j,bm09g,bm09j,bm10g,bm10j,bm11g,bm11j,bm12g,bm12j,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' ) SELECT '湿地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm00g as 面积, round(bm00g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm01g as 面积,round(bm01g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm02g as 面积, round(bm02g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm03g as 面积, round(bm03g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm04g as 面积,round(bm04g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, '国有' as 权属,bm07g as 面积, round(bm07g*100/hj,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,'国有' as 权属, bm08g as 面积, theme.datatable: select 下级名称 as 行政区,一级类,面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year from ( SELECT '湿地' as 一级类, 湿地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '耕地' as 一级类,耕地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 一级类,种植园用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '林地' as 一级类,林地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '草地' as 一级类,草地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 一级类,商业服务业用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 一级类,工矿用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 一级类,住宅用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 一级类,公共管理与公共服务用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 一级类,特殊用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 一级类,交通运输用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 一级类,水域及水利设施用地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' union all SELECT '其他土地' as 一级类,其他土地 as 面积,下级名称,下级代码,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') a where 下级代码 in (select 下级代码 from (select 下级代码,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') a order by rn) select 下级名称 as 行政区,合计 as 面积 from view_sd_frdyjflhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 合计 desc

theme.datatable: with a as (select 合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地,f_xzqhdm,f_year from view_sd_hdyjflhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' ) select '湿地' as 地类,湿地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(湿地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '耕地' as 地类,耕地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(耕地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '种植园用地' as 地类,种植园用地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(种植园用地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '林地' as 地类,林地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(林地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '草地' as 地类,草地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(草地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '商业服务业用地' as 地类,商业服务业用地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(商业服务业用地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '工矿用地' as 地类,工矿用地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(工矿用地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '住宅用地' as 地类,住宅用地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 then 0.00 else round(住宅用地/合计*100 ::numeric,2) end as 面积比例,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,公共管理与公共服务用地 as 各类面积,case when 合计=0 theme.datatable: with a as (select 合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地,农用地,建设用地 ,未利用地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') ) SELECT '湿地' as 地类, round(湿地,2) as 面积, round(湿地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类, round(耕地,2) as 面积,round(耕地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类, round(种植园用地,2) as 面积,round(种植园用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类, round(林地,2) as 面积,round(林地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类, round(草地,2) as 面积,round(草地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类, round(商业服务业用地,2) as 面积,round(商业服务业用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, round(工矿用地,2) as 面积,round(工矿用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, round(住宅用地,2) as 面积,round(住宅用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类, round(公共管理与公共服务用地,2) as 面积,round(公共管理与公共服务用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类, round(特殊用地,2) as 面积,round(特殊用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类, round(交通运输用地,2) as 面积,round(交通运输用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类, round(水域及水利设施用地,2) as 面积,round(水域及水利设施用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类, round(其他土地,2) as 面积,round(其他土地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '农用地' as 地类, round(农用地,2) as 面积, round(农用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '建设用地' as 地类, round(建设用地,2) as 面积,round(建设用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '未利用地' as 地类, round(未利用地,2) as 面积,round(未利用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a

theme.datatable: with a as (select 下级名称,下级代码,合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}') select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,湿地 as 面积,round(湿地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'湿地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,耕地 as 面积,round(耕地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'耕地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,种植园用地 as 面积,round(种植园用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'种植园用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,林地 as 面积,round(林地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'林地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,草地 as 面积,round(草地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'草地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,商业服务业用地 as 面积,round(商业服务业用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'商业服务业用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,工矿用地 as 面积,round(工矿用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'工矿用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,住宅用地 as 面积,round(住宅用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'住宅用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,公共管理与公共服务用地 as 面积,round(公共管理与公共服务用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,特殊用地 as 面积,round(特殊用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'特殊用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,交通运输用地 as 面积,round(交通运输用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'交通运输用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,水域及水利设施用地 as 面积,round(水域及水利设施用地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'水域及水利设施用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,其他土地 as 面积,round(其他土地*100/合计,2) as 筛选排名,'其他土地' as 地类 from a

datatable.name: 土地利用权属性质结构

theme.datatable: with a as (select ghj,jhj from view_sd_yjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '国有' as 权属,ghj as 面积 from a union all select '集体' as 权属,jhj as 面积 from a

datatable.name: 土地权属构成

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm00g,bm00j,bm01g,bm01j,bm02g,bm02j,bm03g,bm03j,bm04g,bm04j,bm05g,bm05j,bm06g,bm06j,bm07g,bm07j,bm08g,bm08j,bm09g,bm09j,bm10g,bm10j,bm11g,bm11j,bm12g,bm12j FROM view_sd_yjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') SELECT '湿地' as 地类,bm00g as 国有, bm00j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类,bm01g as 国有, bm01j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类,bm02g as 国有, bm02j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类,bm03g as 国有, bm03j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类,bm04g as 国有, bm04j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类,bm05g as 国有, bm05j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, bm06g as 国有, bm06j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, bm07g as 国有, bm07j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,bm08g as 国有, bm08j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类,bm09g as 国有, bm09j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类,bm10g as 国有, bm10j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,bm11g as 国有, bm11j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类,bm12g as 国有, bm12j as 集体 FROM a

theme.datatable: with a as (select ls0101,ls0102,ls0103,lyfl0101,lyfl0102,lyfl0103,fls0101,fls0102,fls0103,lljz0101,lljz0102,lljz0103,xg0101,xg0102,xg0103,wg0101,wg0102,wg0103 from view_sd_tdlyzzsx_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '种植粮食作物' as 类型,ls0101 as "水田",ls0102 as "水浇地",ls0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '种植非粮食作物' as 类型,fls0101 as "水田",fls0102 as "水浇地",fls0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '粮与非粮轮作' as 类型,lyfl0101 as "水田",lyfl0102 as "水浇地",lyfl0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '林粮间作' as 类型,lljz0101 as "水田",lljz0102 as "水浇地",lljz0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '休耕' as 类型,xg0101 as "水田",xg0102 as "水浇地",xg0103 as "旱地" from a union all select '未耕种' as 类型,wg0101 as "水田",wg0102 as "水浇地",wg0103 as "旱地" from a

datatable.name: 耕地细化

theme.datatable: with a as (select hj,hdgd,hqgd,lqgd,mqgd,shgd,smgd,yjgd,f_year,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(hdgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(hqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(lqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(mqgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(shgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(smgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd as 面积,case when hj=0 then 0.00 else round(yjgd/hj*100,2) end as 占比,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a

datatable.name: 耕地细化内各地类

theme.datatable: with a as (select hdgd0101,hdgd0102,hdgd0103,hqgd0101,hqgd0102,hqgd0103,lqgd0101,lqgd0102, lqgd0103,mqgd0101,mqgd0102, mqgd0103,shgd0101,shgd0102, shgd0103,smgd0101,smgd0102, smgd0103,yjgd0101,yjgd0102, yjgd0103 from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd0101 as 水田,hdgd0102 as 水浇地, hdgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd0101 as 水田,hqgd0102 as 水浇地, hqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd0101 as 水田,lqgd0102 as 水浇地, lqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd0101 as 水田,mqgd0102 as 水浇地, mqgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd0101 as 水田,shgd0102 as 水浇地, shgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd0101 as 水田,smgd0102 as 水浇地, smgd0103 as 旱地 from a union all select '盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd0101 as 水田,yjgd0102 as 水浇地, yjgd0103 as 旱地 from a

datatable.name: 各行政区耕地细化调查情况统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,hj,河道耕地,hdgd0101,hdgd0102,hdgd0103,湖区耕地,hqgd0101,hqgd0102,hqgd0103,林区耕地,lqgd0101,lqgd0102,lqgd0103,牧区耕地,mqgd0101,mqgd0102,mqgd0103, 沙荒耕地,shgd0101,shgd0102,shgd0103,石漠化耕地,smgd0101,smgd0102,smgd0103,盐碱耕地,yjgd0101,yjgd0102,yjgd0103 from view_sd_tdlyxhdl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 行政区各种植类型面积
种植园用地细化

theme.datatable: select a.hj as {xzqh}种植园用地总面积,case when b.种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round(a.hj/b.种植园用地*100,2) end as 占种植园用地总面积的比例 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_{jb} a ,view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整种植园用地

theme.datatable: select 可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地 as 可调整种植园用地总面积,case when 种植园用地=0 then 0.00 else round((可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地)/种植园用地*100,6) end as 占种植园用地总面积的比例 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} a, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整种植园用地面积汇总表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,可调整果园+可调整茶园+可调整橡胶园+可调整其他园地,可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地 FROM view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 林地细化

theme.datatable: select '垃圾填埋林地分类面积' as 类型, (乔木林地+竹林地+灌木林地+其他林地) as 面积 from view_sd_fqxhbztjb_{jb} where f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter} union all select '林地总面积' as 类型, 林地 as 面积 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter}

datatable.name: 可调整属性_林地

theme.datatable: with a as (select (bm0301k+bm0302k+bm0307k) as hj,bm0301k,bm0302k,bm0307k from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,round(sum(面积)/(case when sum(hj)=0 then 1 else sum(hj) end)*100,2) as 占比 from ( select '可调整乔木林地' as 地类,bm0301k as 面积,hj from a union all select '可调整竹林地' as 地类,bm0302k as 面积,hj from a union all select '可调整其他林地' as 地类,bm0307k as 面积,hj from a ) b group by 地类

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_林地

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm03,bm0301k,bm0302k,bm0307k from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,round(sum(面积)/(case when sum(bm03)=0 then 1 else sum(bm03) end)*100,6) as 占比 from ( select '可调整乔木林地' as 地类,bm0301k as 面积,bm03 from a union all select '可调整竹林地' as 地类,bm0302k as 面积,bm03 from a union all select '可调整其他林地' as 地类,bm0307k as 面积,bm03 from a) c group by 地类

datatable.name: 可调整地类_草地

theme.datatable: select sum(bm0403k) as {xzqh}可调整人工牧草地总面积,round(sum(bm0403k)/sum(bm04)*100,6) as 占草地总面积的比例 from ( select bm0403k,bm04 from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') a

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_草地

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm04,bm0401,bm0402,bm0404,bm0403k,bm0403 from view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select 地类,sum(面积) as 面积,case when (sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100) >0.01 then round(sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100,2) else round(sum(面积)/sum(bm04)*100,6) end as 占比 from ( select '天然牧草地' as 地类,bm0401 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '人工牧草地' as 地类,bm0403 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '其他草地' as 地类,bm0404 as 面积,bm04 from a union all select '可调整人工牧草地' as 地类,bm0403k as 面积,bm04 from a) c group by 地类

datatable.name: 恢复属性_草地

theme.datatable: select 类型,面积,round(a.面积/b.草地*100,6) as 占比 from ( select '即可恢复' as 类型,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404 as 面积 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') union all select '工程恢复' as 类型,gchf0403k+gchf0404 as 面积 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) a ,view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 恢复属性详情_草地

theme.datatable: SELECT '即可恢复' as 类型,0 as 天然牧草地, jkhf0403k as 人工牧草地,jkhf0404 as 其他草地 FROM view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') union all select '工程恢复' as 类型, 0 as 天然牧草地,gchf0403k as 人工牧草地,gchf0404 as 其他草地 from view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 湿地面积和地块信息

theme.datatable: with a as (select "8公顷以上的湿地",round("8公顷以上的湿地面积"/10000,2) as "8公顷以上的湿地面积","8公顷以下的湿地",round("8公顷以下的湿地面积"/10000,2) as "8公顷以下的湿地面积" from view_sd_sddkmj_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '8公顷以上的湿地' as 地块类型,"8公顷以上的湿地" as 地块,"8公顷以上的湿地面积" as 面积,round("8公顷以上的湿地面积"/("8公顷以上的湿地面积"+"8公顷以下的湿地面积")*100,2) as 占比 from a union all select '8公顷以下的湿地' as 地块类型,"8公顷以下的湿地" as 地块,"8公顷以下的湿地面积" as 面积,round("8公顷以下的湿地面积"/("8公顷以上的湿地面积"+"8公顷以下的湿地面积")*100,2) as 占比 from a

datatable.name: 林区范围内种植园用地汇总统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,下级代码,hj,bm0201,bm0202,bm0203,bm0204 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 种植园用地细化详情

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm0201,bm0202,bm0203,bm0204 from view_sd_lqnydhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select 地类,面积,round(面积/种植园用地*100,2) as 占比 from ( select '果园' as 地类,bm0201 as 面积 from a union all select '茶园' as 地类,bm0202 as 面积 from a union all select '橡胶园' as 地类,bm0203 as 面积 from a union all select '其他园地' as 地类,bm0204 as 面积 from a) c, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 林地细化标注面积汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,(乔木林地+竹林地+灌木林地+其他林地),乔木林地,竹林地,灌木林地,其他林地 FROM view_sd_fqxhbztjb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 林地细化详情

theme.datatable: with a as (select c.林地,b.乔木林地,b.竹林地,b.灌木林地,b.其他林地 from view_sd_fqxhbztjb_{jb} b left join view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} c on b.f_year=c.f_year and b.f_xzqhdm=c.f_xzqhdm where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '乔木林地' as 地类,乔木林地 as 面积, case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(乔木林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '竹林地' as 地类,竹林地 as 面积, case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(竹林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '灌木林地' as 地类,灌木林地 as 面积, case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(灌木林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a union all select '其他林地' as 地类,其他林地 as 面积, case when 林地=0 then 0.00 else round(其他林地*100/林地,2) end as 占比 from a

datatable.name: 草地面积汇总表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,sum(bm04),sum(bm0401),sum(bm0403),sum(bm0403k),sum(bm0404) FROM view_sd_tdlyqsxzhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' group by 下级名称,下级代码 order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 即可恢复与工程恢复种植属性汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404+gchf0403k+gchf0404,jkhf0403k+jkhf0404,jkhf0403k,jkhf0404,gchf0403k+gchf0404,gchf0403k,gchf0404 FROM view_sd_jkhfgchfzzsxlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 可调整地类柱状图_园地

theme.datatable: with a as (select 可调整果园,可调整茶园,可调整橡胶园,可调整其他园地 from view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select 地类,面积,round(面积/种植园用地*100,2) as 占比 from ( select '果园' as 地类,可调整果园 as 面积 from a union all select '茶园' as 地类,可调整茶园 as 面积 from a union all select '橡胶园' as 地类,可调整橡胶园 as 面积 from a union all select '其他园地' as 地类,可调整其他园地 as 面积 from a) c, view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} b where b.f_year ={yearfilter} and b.f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')

datatable.name: 可调整林地面积分类汇总统计表

theme.datatable: SELECT 下级名称,下级代码,(可调整乔木林地+可调整竹林地+可调整其他林地),可调整乔木林地,可调整竹林地,可调整其他林地 FROM view_sd_jbntwktzdlhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 筛选排名

theme.datatable: select f_xzqhmc as 行政区 ,f_xzqhdm as 下级代码, sum( {lx}) as 面积 , 0 as 筛选排名 , '耕地' as 地类 from view_tbhztj_stat_base_gq_{jb} where f_year ='{yearfilter}' and pre_xzqhdm =('{xzqhfilter}') {where}{ppt} group by f_xzqhdm,f_xzqhmc

theme.datatable: with a as (select gdmj,pdmj,hj2,hj6,hj15,hj25,f_xzqhdm,f_year from view_sd_gdpdfjhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '≤2°' as 坡度级,pdmj as 面积,round(pdmj/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '2°~6°' as 坡度级,hj2 as 面积,round(hj2/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '6°~15°' as 坡度级,hj6 as 面积,round(hj6/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '15°~25°' as 坡度级,hj15 as 面积,round(hj15/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '>25°' as 坡度级,hj25 as 面积,round(hj25/gdmj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a

with a as (select 合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地,农用地,建设用地 ,未利用地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') ) SELECT '湿地' as 地类, round(湿地,2) as 面积, round(湿地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类, round(耕地,2) as 面积,round(耕地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类, round(种植园用地,2) as 面积,round(种植园用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类, round(林地,2) as 面积,round(林地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类, round(草地,2) as 面积,round(草地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类, round(商业服务业用地,2) as 面积,round(商业服务业用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, round(工矿用地,2) as 面积,round(工矿用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, round(住宅用地,2) as 面积,round(住宅用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类, round(公共管理与公共服务用地,2) as 面积,round(公共管理与公共服务用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类, round(特殊用地,2) as 面积,round(特殊用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类, round(交通运输用地,2) as 面积,round(交通运输用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类, round(水域及水利设施用地,2) as 面积,round(水域及水利设施用地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类, round(其他土地,2) as 面积,round(其他土地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,'调查工作分类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '农用地' as 地类, round(农用地,2) as 面积, round(农用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '建设用地' as 地类, round(建设用地,2) as 面积,round(建设用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a union all SELECT '未利用地' as 地类, round(未利用地,2) as 面积,round(未利用地*100/合计,2) as 占比,'三大类' as 类别 FROM a
SELECT 地类,地类面积 FROM view_sd_ejtdlyfl_{jb} where f_xzqhdm = fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and f_year ={yearfilter} and 一级地类名 = substr('{childfilter}' , position('->' in '{childfilter}' )+2)
with a as (select 下级名称,下级代码,合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}') select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,湿地 as 面积,round(湿地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'湿地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,耕地 as 面积,round(耕地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'耕地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,种植园用地 as 面积,round(种植园用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'种植园用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,林地 as 面积,round(林地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'林地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,草地 as 面积,round(草地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'草地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,商业服务业用地 as 面积,round(商业服务业用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'商业服务业用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,工矿用地 as 面积,round(工矿用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'工矿用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,住宅用地 as 面积,round(住宅用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'住宅用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,公共管理与公共服务用地 as 面积,round(公共管理与公共服务用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,特殊用地 as 面积,round(特殊用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'特殊用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,交通运输用地 as 面积,round(交通运输用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'交通运输用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,水域及水利设施用地 as 面积,round(水域及水利设施用地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'水域及水利设施用地' as 地类 from a union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,其他土地 as 面积,round(其他土地*100/合计,2) as 占本{subjb}国土调查总面积比例,'其他土地' as 地类 from a
with a as (select ghj,jhj from view_sd_yjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '国有' as 权属,ghj as 面积 from a union all select '集体' as 权属,jhj as 面积 from a
with a as (select bm00g,bm00j,bm01g,bm01j,bm02g,bm02j,bm03g,bm03j,bm04g,bm04j,bm05g,bm05j,bm06g,bm06j,bm07g,bm07j,bm08g,bm08j,bm09g,bm09j,bm10g,bm10j,bm11g,bm11j,bm12g,bm12j FROM view_sd_yjflqshzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') SELECT '湿地' as 地类,bm00g as 国有, bm00j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类,bm01g as 国有, bm01j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类,bm02g as 国有, bm02j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类,bm03g as 国有, bm03j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类,bm04g as 国有, bm04j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类,bm05g as 国有, bm05j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, bm06g as 国有, bm06j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, bm07g as 国有, bm07j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,bm08g as 国有, bm08j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类,bm09g as 国有, bm09j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类,bm10g as 国有, bm10j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,bm11g as 国有, bm11j as 集体 FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类,bm12g as 国有, bm12j as 集体 FROM a
select 下级名称,合计,湿地,耕地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地,交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码
select 下级名称,合计,湿地,红树林地,森林沼泽,灌丛沼泽,沼泽草地,盐田,沿海滩涂,内陆滩涂,沼泽地, 耕地,水田,水浇地,旱地,种植园用地,果园,茶园,橡胶园,其他园地,林地,乔木林地,竹林地, 灌木林地,其他林地,草地,天然牧草地,人工牧草地,其他草地,商业服务业用地,商业服务业设施用地, 物流仓储用地,工矿用地,工业用地,采矿用地,住宅用地,城镇住宅用地,农村宅基地,公共管理与公共服务用地,机关团体新闻出版用地,科教文卫用地,公用设施用地,公园与绿地,交通运输用地,铁路用地,轨道交通用地,公路用地,城镇村道路用地,交通服务场站用地,农村道路,机场用地,港口码头用地, 管道运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,河流水面,湖泊水面,水库水面,坑塘水面,沟渠,水工建筑用地,冰川及永久积雪,其他土地,空闲地,设施农用地,田坎,盐碱地,沙地,裸土地,裸岩石砾地 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码
select 下级名称,hj,ghj,jhj,bm00,bm00g,bm00j,bm01,bm01g,bm01j,bm02,bm02g,bm02j,bm03,bm03g,bm03j,bm04,bm04g,bm04j,bm05,bm05g,bm05j,bm06,bm06g,bm06j,bm07,bm07g,bm07j,bm08,bm08g,bm08j,bm09,bm09g,bm09j,bm10,bm10g,bm10j,bm11,bm11g,bm11j, bm12,bm12g,bm12j from view_sd_yjflqshzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 下级代码
with a as (select bm201,bm202,bm203,bm204,bm205 from view_sd_czcgkjydhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}')) select '城市' as 类型, bm201 as 面积 from a union all select '建制镇' as 类型, bm202 as 面积 from a union all select '村庄' as 类型, bm203 as 面积 from a union all select '盐田及采矿用地' as 类型, bm204 as 面积 from a union all select '特殊用地' as 类型, bm205 as 面积 from a
with a as (select case when 类型 = '城市用地' then '城市' when 类型 = '建制镇用地' then '建制镇' when 类型 = '村庄用地' then '村庄' when 类型 = '盐田及采矿用地' then '盐田及采矿用地' when 类型 = '特殊用地' then '特殊用地' end as 类型, bm00,bm01,bm02,bm03,bm04,bm05,bm06,bm07,bm08,bm09,bm10,bm11,bm12 from view_sd_czcgkjydyjdlhzb_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') and 类型 <> '城镇村及工矿用地') select 类型,'湿地' as 地类,bm00 as 面积 from a union all select 类型,'耕地' as 地类,bm01 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '种植园用地' as 地类,bm02 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '林地' as 地类,bm03 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '草地' as 地类,bm04 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '商业服务业用地' as 地类,bm05 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '工矿用地' as 地类,bm06 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '住宅用地' as 地类,bm07 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类,bm08 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '特殊用地' as 地类,bm09 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '交通运输用地' as 地类,bm10 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类,bm11 as 面积 from a union all select 类型, '其他土地' as 地类,bm12 as 面积 from a
select 下级名称,bm20,bm20_00,bm20_01,bm20_02,bm20_03,bm20_04,bm20_05,bm20_06,bm20_07,bm20_08,bm20_09,bm20_10,bm20_11,bm20_12,bm201,bm201_00,bm201_01,bm201_02,bm201_03,bm201_04,bm201_05,bm201_06,bm201_07,bm201_08,bm201_09,bm201_10,bm201_11,bm201_12, bm202,bm202_00,bm202_01,bm202_02,bm202_03,bm202_04,bm202_05,bm202_06,bm202_07,bm202_08,bm202_09,bm202_10,bm202_11,bm202_12,bm203,bm203_00,bm203_01,bm203_02,bm203_03,bm203_04,bm203_05,bm203_06,bm203_07,bm203_08,bm203_09,bm203_10,bm203_11,bm203_12, bm204,bm204_00,bm204_01,bm204_02,bm204_03,bm204_04,bm204_05,bm204_06,bm204_07,bm204_08,bm204_09,bm204_10,bm204_11,bm204_12,bm205,bm205_00,bm205_01,bm205_02,bm205_03,bm205_04,bm205_05,bm205_06,bm205_07,bm205_08,bm205_09,bm205_10,bm205_11,bm205_12 from view_sd_czcgkjydhzb_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') order by 下级代码
with a as (select 农用地 as 总面积 ,水田 ,水浇地 ,旱地 ,果园 ,茶园 ,橡胶园 ,其他园地 ,乔木林地 ,竹林地 ,红树林地 ,森林沼泽 ,灌木林地 ,灌丛沼泽 ,其他林地 ,天然牧草地 ,沼泽草地 ,人工牧草地 ,农村道路 ,水库水面 ,坑塘水面 ,沟渠 ,设施农用地 ,田坎 , f_year ,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_tdlyfl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm =fn_delxzqhdm_endzero('{xzqhfilter}') ) select '水田' as 二级类型 , 水田 as 各类面积 , round ( 水田 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '水浇地' as 二级类型 , 水浇地 as 各类面积 , round ( 水浇地 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '旱地' as 二级类型 , 旱地 as 各类面积 , round ( 旱地 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '果园' as 二级类型 , 果园 as 各类面积 , round ( 果园 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '茶园' as 二级类型 , 茶园 as 各类面积 , round ( 茶园 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '橡胶园' as 二级类型 , 橡胶园 as 各类面积 , round ( 橡胶园 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '其他园地' as 二级类型 , 其他园地 as 各类面积 , round ( 其他园地 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all select '乔木林地' as 二级类型 , 乔木林地 as 各类面积 , round ( 乔木林地 /总面积 * 100 , 2) as 面积比例 from a union all
